jde-development envirement plugin of vim 　 　

jde-development envirement plugin of vim

published 12 Aug 2012

Just a Development Environment for VIM(VJDE),support Java/C++/jsp/html/xml (VIM>=700 , +ruby future is on , JDK 1.5 support , JDK1.4 (maybe, not tested))

offical homepage is VJDE. it’s qute simple to install:

tar -xzf vjde.tgz  /usr/share/vim/vimfiles 
chmod +x /usr/share/vim/vimfiles/plugin/vjde/readtags

use to complete code.
